biotools.summary: A user-friendly web application for predicting complex co-membership from affinity purification – mass spectrometry data. This web application employs a logistic regression classifier that integrates existing, proven APMS scoring approaches (SAINT, CompPASS, and HGSCore), gene co-expression patterns, functional annotations, domain-domain binding affinity, and homologous interactions, which we have shown outperforms existing APMS scoring methods.

bioschemas.name: Spotlite
